Capture and organize your thoughts using: Capture and organize your thoughts using Mem.ai
You can obtain your API key by navigatin: You can obtain your API key by navigating to **Integrations→ API**.
Save any content to Mem.ai for intellige: Save any content to Mem.ai for intelligent processing and future reference.
Log a plain-text Markdown note into Mem,: Log a plain-text Markdown note into Mem, optionally with formatting, templates, collections, and timestamps.
Delete a note in Mem by its ID.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Hacer una llamada API personalizada a un extremo específico
No Error on Failure: No hay ningún error en fallo
Raw content you want to remember - HTML,: Raw content you want to remember - HTML, emails, transcripts, or simple notes.
Optional guidance on how you want this c: Optional guidance on how you want this content processed or remembered.
Additional background information to rel: Additional background information to relate this to your existing knowledge.
Markdown-formatted content. First line i: Markdown-formatted content. First line is treated as the note title.
Optional UUID to assign to the note.
Collection titles or IDs to assign this: Collection titles or IDs to assign this note to. New collections will be created if they don’t exist.
The ID of the note to delete.
Authorization headers are injected autom: Las cabeceras de autorización se inyectan automáticamente desde tu conexión.
Enable for files like PDFs, images, etc..
